entry.title: New release for qBit Manage: v4.1.13
entry.content:
Requirements Updated

entry.title: New release for qBit Manage: v4.1.17
entry.content:
New Updates

  • Adds support for environment variables in config file using (!ENV VAR_NAME)
  • Add Retries on ConnectionError (#740)
  • Fixes #702
  • Removes warning when remote_dir is not defined

Special thanks to @NooNameR for their contributions! Full Changelog: https://github.com/StuffAnThings/qbit_manage/compare/v4.1.16...v4.1.17
